CustomField.description: DEFLECT: Displays message defined in "Additional Information" fields and the "Submit" button BLOCK: DOES NOT display message, file upload section and "Submit" button SUBMIT: Displays message defined in "Additional Information" fields and the "Submit" button
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
DEFLECT: Displays message defined in "Additional Information" fields and the "Submit" button
BLOCK: DOES NOT display message, file upload section and "Submit" button
QUESTION/SUBMIT: Displays message defined in "Additional Information" fields and the "Submit" button
CustomField.label: Secondary Action Type
